veryWell.text: You’ve done very well, Olive. I’m proud of you.
Impressive, Olive. Your hard work is paying off.

extremelyWell.text: Extraordinary work, Olive! You’ve surpassed my expectations.
You’ve done amazingly well, Olive. Keep shining bright!

noLongerLearn.text: Olive, it's been an honor teaching you, but I believe you’ve surpassed all I can offer.
You've learned all I can teach you, Olive. It's time to seek new horizons.

noLongerPay.text: I'm afraid I can't continue your lessons without payment, Olive. Please come back when you're able.
It's unfortunate, Olive, but I have to maintain my livelihood. Do return when you can pay.

noLongerPayAngry.text: Olive, this is unacceptable. Lessons are not free. Return with payment or not at all.
This is the last straw, Olive. I can't continue teaching you for free. Pay up or leave.

learntNothing.text: It seems you’ve learned nothing from our time together, Olive. I expected better.
Disappointing, Olive. You haven’t grasped anything I’ve taught.

didntLearn.text: Olive, what’s going on? You’ve learned so little.
I’m sorry, I just couldn’t focus.
We’ll need to find a way to better your focus, then.

learntVeryLittle.text: Olive, you’ve learned very little. We need to delve deeper.
Barely scratched the surface, Olive. We must try harder.

learntNotMuch.text: Olive, there's still much left to be learned. Don’t get disheartened.
I know, but it’s so much to take in.
Take your time. Learning is a journey.

learntSomething.text: Well done, Olive. You’ve learned something important today.
Good progress, Olive. You’re on the right path.

learntQuiteALot.text: Olive, you’ve learned quite a lot. Keep this pace up.

learntEverything.text: Olive, you've quite literally exceeded all expectations. There is nothing more I can teach you.
Thank you for everything, master. I’ve learned so much.
It was my pleasure, Olive. Go forth and make the world a better place.

learntallTheTopics.text: Olive, you've mastered all the topics we've covered.
I couldn't have done it without your guidance.
You've done brilliantly, Olive. Carry this knowledge with pride.

notInterested.text: I’m just not interested in this, teacher.
Olive, sometimes the most important lessons are hidden where we least want to look.

distracted.text: Focus, Olive. Distraction is the enemy of progress.

stressed.text: Take a deep breath, Olive. We’ll get through this together.
